languages.text: "Я не стыжусь своей внешности! И мне не нужно чье-либо одобрение!" {n}Кассия отводит взгляд, но заметно расслабляет плечи и скулы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я не стыжусь своей внешности! И мне не нужно чье-либо одобрение!" {n}Кассия отводит взгляд, но заметно расслабляет плечи и скулы.{/n}

languages.text: "I am not ashamed of my appearance! Nor do I require anyone's approval!" {n}Cassia looks away, but her shoulders and jaw visibly relax.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я не стыжусь своей внешности! И мне не нужно чье-либо одобрение!" {n}Кассия отводит взгляд, но заметно расслабляет плечи и скулы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I am not ashamed of my appearance! Nor do I require anybody's approval!" {n}Cassia looks away, but her shoulders and cheekbones relax visibly.{/n}
"I am not ashamed of my appearance! Nor do I require anybody's approval!" {n}Cassia looks away, but her shoulders and cheekbones relax visibly.{/n}
"I am not ashamed of my appearance! Nor do I require anyone's approval!" {n}Cassia looks away, but her shoulders and jaw visibly relax.{/n}

"I am not ashamed of my appearance! Nor do I require anyone's approval!" {n}Cassia looks away, but her shoulders and jaw visibly relax.{/n}

languages.text: “我并不以我的外表为耻！我也不需要任何人的认可！”{n}卡西娅看着远方，但她的肩膀和下巴明显放松了下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am not ashamed of my appearance! Nor do I require anyone's approval!" {n}Cassia looks away, but her shoulders and jaw visibly relax.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我并不以我的外表为耻！我也不需要任何人的认可！”{n}卡西娅看着远方，但她的肩膀和下巴明显放松了下来。{/n}

languages.original_text: "I am not ashamed of my appearance! Nor do I require anyone's approval!" {n}Cassia looks away, but her shoulders and jaw visibly relax.{/n}

languages.text: «¡No me avergüenza mi aspecto! ¡Y tampoco necesito la aprobación de nadie!». {n}Cassia aparta la mirada, pero sus hombros y su mandíbula se relajan visiblemente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am not ashamed of my appearance! Nor do I require anyone's approval!" {n}Cassia looks away, but her shoulders and jaw visibly relax.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡No me avergüenza mi aspecto! ¡Y tampoco necesito la aprobación de nadie!». {n}Cassia aparta la mirada, pero sus hombros y su mandíbula se relajan visiblemente.{/n}

languages.text: 「私は己の外見を恥じてはいません！誰の承認も必要ありません！」{n}カシアは目をそらしたが、その肩と表情は明らかにほころんでいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am not ashamed of my appearance! Nor do I require anyone's approval!" {n}Cassia looks away, but her shoulders and jaw visibly relax.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私は己の外見を恥じてはいません！誰の承認も必要ありません！」{n}カシアは目をそらしたが、その肩と表情は明らかにほころんでいた。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich schäme mich nicht für mein Aussehen! Und bin auf niemandes Billigung angewiesen!" {n}Cassia blickt weg, doch ihre Schultern und ihr Kiefer entspannen sich sichtlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am not ashamed of my appearance! Nor do I require anyone's approval!" {n}Cassia looks away, but her shoulders and jaw visibly relax.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich schäme mich nicht für mein Aussehen! Und bin auf niemandes Billigung angewiesen!" {n}Cassia blickt weg, doch ihre Schultern und ihr Kiefer entspannen sich sichtlich.{/n}

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas honte de mon apparence ! Et je n'ai pas non plus besoin de l'approbation de qui que ce soit ! » {n}Cassia détourne le regard, mais vous voyez ses épaules s'abaisser légèrement et sa mâchoire se détendre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am not ashamed of my appearance! Nor do I require anyone's approval!" {n}Cassia looks away, but her shoulders and jaw visibly relax.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas honte de mon apparence ! Et je n'ai pas non plus besoin de l'approbation de qui que ce soit ! » {n}Cassia détourne le regard, mais vous voyez ses épaules s'abaisser légèrement et sa mâchoire se détendre.{/n}

languages.text: "Böyle göründüğüm için utanmıyorum! Başkalarının beni beğenmesine ihtiyacım yok!" {n}Cassia başını çevirse de omuzlarıyla çenesinin gevşediği gözüne çarpıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am not ashamed of my appearance! Nor do I require anyone's approval!" {n}Cassia looks away, but her shoulders and jaw visibly relax.{/n}
